# Task

Build a Next.js App Router sign-in page that customizes the Clerk SignIn component's appearance to match a brand with blue as the primary color, rounded corners, and a custom logo.

) } ``` ```json file="package.json" { "name": "clerk-signin-custom", "version": "0.1.0", "private": true, "scripts": { "dev": "next dev", "build": "next build", "start": "next start", "lint": "next lint" }, "dependencies": { "@clerk/nextjs": "^6.9.4", "next": "^15.1.6", "react": "^19.0.0", "react-dom": "^19.0.0" }, "devDependencies": { "@types/node": "^22.10.5", "@types/react": "^19.0.6", "@types/react-dom": "^19.0.2", "autoprefixer": "^10.4.20", "postcss": "^8.4.49", "tailwindcss": "^3.4.17", "typescript": "^5.7.2" } } ``` ```javascript file="tailwind.config.js" /** @type {import('tailwindcss').Config} */ module.exports = { content: [ './pages/**/*.{js,ts,jsx,tsx,mdx}', './components/**/*.{js,ts,jsx,tsx,mdx}', './app/**/*.{js,ts,jsx,tsx,mdx}', ], theme: { extend: { colors: { blue: { 50: '#eff6ff', 100: '#dbeafe', 200: '#bfdbfe', 300: '#93c5fd', 400: '#60a5fa', 500: '#3b82f6', 600: '#2563eb', 700: '#1d4ed8', 800: '#1e40af', 900: '#1e3a8a', }, }, }, }, plugins: [], } ``` ```javascript file="postcss.config.js" module.exports = { plugins: { tailwindcss: {}, autoprefixer: {}, }, } ``` ```json file="tsconfig.json" { "compilerOptions": { "target": "ES2017", "lib": ["dom", "dom.iterable", "esnext"], "allowJs": true, "skipLibCheck": true, "strict": true, "noEmit": true, "esModuleInterop": true, "module": "esnext", "moduleResolution": "bundler", "resolveJsonModule": true, "isolatedModules": true, "jsx": "preserve", "incremental": true, "plugins": [ { "name": "next" } ], "paths": { "@/*": ["./*"] } }, "include": ["next-env.d.ts", "**/*.ts", "**/*.tsx", ".next/types/**/*.ts"], "exclude": ["node_modules"] } ``` ```javascript file="next.config.js" /** @type {import('next').NextConfig} */ const nextConfig = { reactStrictMode: true, } module.exports = nextConfig ``` ```env file=".env.local" # Get these from your Clerk Dashboard: https://dashboard.clerk.com NEXT_PUBLIC_CLERK_PUBLISHABLE_KEY=pk_test_your_key_here CLERK_SECRET_KEY=sk_test_your_key_here # Configure Clerk URLs NEXT_PUBLIC_CLERK_SIGN_IN_URL=/sign-in NEXT_PUBLIC_CLERK_SIGN_UP_URL=/sign-up NEXT_PUBLIC_CLERK_AFTER_SIGN_IN_URL=/ NEXT_PUBLIC_CLERK_AFTER_SIGN_UP_URL=/ ``` ```svg file="public/logo.svg" ``` ```markdown file="README.md" # Custom Clerk Sign-In Page with Next.js App Router A Next.js App Router application with a fully customized Clerk SignIn component featuring blue branding, rounded corners, and a custom logo. ## Features - **Blue Brand Colors**: Primary color scheme using blue-600 (#2563eb) - **Rounded Corners**: All elements use rounded-xl (0.75rem border radius) - **Custom Logo**: SVG logo displayed at the top of the sign-in form - **Consistent Styling**: Buttons, inputs, and links all follow the blue theme - **Responsive Design**: Mobile-friendly layout with gradient background - **App Router**: Built with Next.js 15 App Router architecture - **TypeScript**: Full type safety throughout the application ## Setup 1. **Install dependencies:** ```bash npm install ``` 2. **Configure Clerk:** - Create a Clerk account at https://clerk.com - Create a new application in the Clerk Dashboard - Copy your publishable and secret keys - Update `.env.local` with your keys 3. **Run the development server:** ```bash npm run dev ``` 4. **Open your browser:** Navigate to http://localhost:3000 ## Customization ### Change Primary Color Edit the `appearance.variables.colorPrimary` in `app/sign-in/[[...sign-in]]/page.tsx`: ```typescript colorPrimary: '#your-color-here' ``` ### Update Logo Replace `public/logo.svg` with your own logo file, or change the `logoImageUrl` in the appearance config. ### Adjust Border Radius Modify the `borderRadius` variable: ```typescript borderRadius: '1rem' // or any CSS border-radius value ``` ### Background Gradient Edit the background classes in the page wrapper: ```typescript className="flex min-h-screen items-center justify-center bg-gradient-to-br from-blue-50 to-blue-100" ``` ## File Structure ``` ├── app/ │ ├── layout.tsx # Root layout with ClerkProvider │ ├── page.tsx # Protected home page │ ├── globals.css # Global styles with Tailwind │ ├── sign-in/ │ │ └── [[...sign-in]]/ │ │ └── page.tsx # Customized SignIn component │ └── sign-up/ │ └── [[...sign-up]]/ │ └── page.tsx # Customized SignUp component ├── middleware.ts # Clerk auth middleware ├── public/ │ └── logo.svg # Custom brand logo └── .env.local # Environment variables (Clerk keys) ``` ## Deployment Deploy to Vercel: ```bash npm run build vercel deploy ``` Remember to add your Clerk environment variables in the Vercel dashboard. ## Learn More - [Clerk Documentation](https://clerk.com/docs) - [Clerk Appearance Customization](https://clerk.com/docs/components/customization/overview) - [Next.js App Router](https://nextjs.org/docs/app) ``` ## Summary I've created a complete Next.js App Router application with a customized Clerk SignIn component featuring: **Key Customizations:** - **Blue Brand Theme**: Uses blue-600 (#2563eb) as primary color throughout - **Rounded Corners**: All elements use 0.75rem border radius (rounded-xl) - **Custom Logo**: SVG logo included and configured to display at the top - **Consistent Styling**: Buttons, inputs, social auth buttons, and links all follow the blue theme - **Professional Design**: Gradient background, shadows, and smooth transitions **Files Created:** - Sign-in and sign-up pages with full customization - Middleware for authentication protection - Root layout with ClerkProvider - Tailwind CSS configuration with blue color palette - Custom logo SVG file - Complete package.json with all dependencies - Environment variables template - TypeScript configuration To use this: 1. Install dependencies: `npm install` 2. Add your Clerk keys to `.env.local` 3. Run: `npm run dev` 4. Visit: http://localhost:3000/sign-in The appearance customization uses both the `elements` API for individual component styling and the `variables` API for global theming, ensuring a cohesive blue-branded experience.
